Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits motor vehicle rental agencies from discriminating against a person because any of the authorized operators do not have a credit card
Summary: Prohibits motor vehicle rental agencies from discriminating against a person because he or she does not have a major credit card.
LawCode: Amd ยง391-l, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the rental of motor vehicles
